data.text:
The Cole Porter Festival happens each year - the 2nd weekend of June - in Cole Porter’s hometown of Peru, Indiana.

A unique series of live music and special events celebrate the legacy and music of Cole Porter while highlighting his special connection to the town of Peru. We honor the memory of Porter with traditional focus, as well as innovative new experiences to encourage interest among new and diverse audiences.
